A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Truly the first of the entire Star Wars franchise to leave a bad taste in my mouth. I'd watch the Holiday Special 10 times before ever watching this garbage again. 

JJ Abrams did so well with Episode VII. He set up Episode VIII perfectly. He set it up to where this Sequel Trilogy could end the SKYWALKER Saga with elegance. Caps on Skywalker because this story is the Skywalker's. Unfortunately\, Rian Johnson didn't give us that. He gave Luke a shitty death\, Rey a lineage that doesn't have anything to do with the Skywalker family and a drawn out film that had more plot holes than plot. And\, Snoke? What the hell was that? 

Half a star was too much to give for this movie that I'm sad to even call part of the Star Wars franchise. Sorry for the emo Kylo rant\, but all true.
